title: L'Inferno
description: chance

title: Cabiria
description: Cabiria is a Roman child when her home is destroyed by a volcano. Sold in Carthage to be sacrificed in a temple, is saved by Fulvio, a Roman spy. But danger lurks, and hatred between Rome and Carthage can only lead to war.

title: Tillie's Punctured Romance
description: A con man from the city dupes a wealthy country girl into marriage.

title: Nascita di una nazione
description: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

title: The Cheat
description: A venal, spoiled stockbroker's wife impulsively embezzles $10,000 from the charity she chairs and desperately turns to a Burmese ivory trader to replace the stolen money.

title: I vampiri
description: An intrepid reporter and his loyal friend battle a bizarre secret society of criminals known as The Vampires.

title: Intolerance
description: The story of a poor young woman, separated by prejudice from her husband and baby, is interwoven with tales of intolerance from throughout history.

title: Charlot soldato
description: Charlie is a boot camp private who has a dream of being a hero who goes on a daring mission behind enemy lines.

title: Giglio infranto
description: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

title: Il gabinetto del dottor Caligari
description: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

title: Dr. Jekyll e Mr. Hyde
description: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

title: Il Golem - Come venne al mondo
description: In 16th-century Prague, a rabbi creates the Golem - a giant creature made of clay. Using sorcery, he brings the creature to life in order to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.

title: Il segno di Zorro
description: A seemingly idiotic fop is really the courageous vigilante Zorro, who seeks to protect the oppressed.

title: Agonia sui ghiacci
description: A naive country girl is tricked into a sham marriage by a wealthy womanizer, then must rebuild her life despite the taint of having borne a child out of wedlock.

title: Within Our Gates
description: Abandoned by her fiancé, an educated black woman with a shocking past dedicates herself to helping a near bankrupt school for impoverished black youths.

title: I quattro cavalieri dell'Apocalisse
description: An extended family split up in France and Germany find themselves on opposing sides of the battlefield during World War I.

title: Il monello
description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

title: Il carrettiere della morte
description: On New Year's Eve, the driver of a ghostly carriage forces a drunken man to reflect on his selfish, wasted life.

title: Destino
description: When a woman's fiancé disappears, Death gives her three chances to save him from his fate.

title: Le due orfanelle
description: Two orphaned sisters are caught up in the turmoil of the French Revolution, encountering misery and love along the way.

title: Lo sceicco
description: A charming Arabian sheik becomes infatuated with an adventurous, modern-thinking Englishwoman and abducts her to his home in the Saharan desert.

title: L'età di amare
description: A young woman marries an older millionaire and then falls in love with a handsome nobleman on her honeymoon.

title: Femmine folli
description: A con artist masquerades a Russian nobility and attempts to seduce the wife of an American diplomat.

title: Nosferatu - Il vampiro
description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

title: Il gobbo di Notre Dame
description: In 15th-century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.

title: Accidenti che ospitalità!
description: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

title: Il pellegrino
description: The Tramp is an escaped convict who is mistaken as a pastor in a small town church.

title: Preferisco l'ascensore
description: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

title: Senti, amore mio
description: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

title: La donna di Parigi
description: A kept woman runs into her former fiancé and finds herself torn between love and comfort.

title: Aelita
description: A mysterious radio message is beamed around the world, and among the engineers who receive it are Los, the hero, and his colleague Spiridonov. Los is an individualist dreamer. Aelita is the...

title: Tutte e nessuna
description: A shy, young man, who is completely incapable of talking to women, decides to write a book that details to other bachelors how to find a girlfriend.

title: Quello che prende gli schiaffi
description: A bitter clown endeavors to rescue the young woman he loves from the lecherous count who once betrayed him.

title: L'ultima risata
description: An aging doorman, after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious Hotel is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbours and society.

title: Il navigatore
description: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

title: I Nibelunghi: La vendetta di Crimilde
description: After Siegfried's dead, Kriemhild marries Etzel, the King of the Huns. She gives birth to a child, and invites her brothers for a party. She tries to persuade Etzel and the other Huns, that...

title: I Nibelunghi: Sigfrido
description: Siegfried, son of King Sigmund, hears of the beautiful sister of Gunter, King of Worms, Kriemhild. On his way to Worms, he kills a dragon and finds a treasure, the Hort. He helps Gunther to...

title: Orlacs Hände
description: A world-famous pianist loses both hands in an accident. When new hands are grafted on, he doesn't know they once belonged to a murderer.

title: La palla n° 13
description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: Sciopero
description: A group of oppressed factory workers go on strike in pre-revolutionary Russia.

title: Il ladro di Bagdad
description: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.

title: Le avventure del principe Achmed
description: A handsome prince rides a flying horse to faraway lands and embarks on magical adventures, which include befriending a witch, meeting Aladdin, battling demons and falling in love with a princess.

title: La grande parata
description: A young American soldier witnesses the horrors of the Great War.

title: La corazzata Potemkin
description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

title: Viva lo sport
description: A nerdy college student will do anything to become popular on campus.

title: Io e la vacca
description: With little luck at keeping a job in the city a New Yorker tries work in the country and eventually finds his way leading a herd of cattle to the West Coast.

title: La febbre dell'oro
description: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

title: Rapacità
description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

title: Un mondo perduto
description: The first film adaptation of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel about a land where prehistoric creatures still roam.

title: La vedova allegra
description: A prince must woo the now wealthy dancer he once abandoned in order to keep her money in the country in order to keep it from crashing economically.

title: Il fantasma dell'opera
description: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

title: Il labirinto delle passioni
description: Two couples' romances are fancifully intertwined.

title: Le sette probabilità
description: A man learns he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7 p.m. that same day.

title: Se perdo la pazienza...
description: A love-struck weakling must pretend to be boxer in order to gain respect from the family of the girl he loves.

title: Faust
description: The demon Mephisto wagers with God that he can corrupt a mortal man's soul.

title: La carne e il diavolo
description: Childhood friends are torn apart when one of them marries the woman the other once fiercely loved.

title: Una pagina di follia
description: A man takes a job at an asylum with hopes of freeing his imprisoned wife.

title: Il pensionante
description: A landlady suspects her new lodger is the madman killing women in London.

title: La madre
description: A story about a family torn apart by a worker's strike. At first, the mother wants to protect her family from the troublemakers, but eventually she realizes that her son is right and the workers should strike.

title: Metropolis
description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

title: Il castello degli spettri
description: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.

title: Tuo per sempre
description: To reconcile with his girlfriend, a bookish college student tries to become an athlete.

title: Il declino
description: Public schoolboy Roddy Berwick is expelled from school when he takes the blame for a friend's charge and his life falls apart in a series of misadventures.

title: Fragile virtù
description: A recently divorced woman hides her scandalous past from her new husband and his family.

title: Come vinsi la guerra
description: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

title: Cosetta
description: A salesgirl with plenty of "it" (sex appeal) pursues a handsome playboy.

title: Il cantante di jazz
description: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

title: Il fratello minore
description: A sheriff's milquetoast son has a chance to prove himself when a medicine show run by con artists comes into town.

title: Napoleone
description: A film about the French general's youth and early military career.

title: Ottobre!
description: A large-scale view on the events of 1917 in Russia, when the monarchy was overthrown.

title: Vinci per me!
description: Two boxers compete for the love of a woman.

title: Settimo cielo
description: A street cleaner saves a young woman's life, and the pair slowly fall in love until war intervenes.

title: Aurora
description: An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.

title: Le notti di Chicago
description: Boisterous gangster kingpin Bull Weed rehabilitates his former lawyer from his alcoholic haze, but complications arise when he falls for Weed's girlfriend.

title: Lo sconosciuto
description: A criminal on the run hides in a circus and seeks to possess the daughter of the ringmaster at any cost.

title: Ali
description: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

title: Il vaso di Pandora
description: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

title: Il cameraman
description: Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.

title: La caduta della casa Usher
description: Allan visits the sinister Usher family mansion, where his friend Roderick is painting a portrait of his sickly wife Madeline. The portrait seems to be draining the life out of Madeline, slowly leading to her death.

title: Il circo
description: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

title: I dannati dell'oceano
description: A blue-collar worker on New York's depressed waterfront finds his life changed after he saves a woman attempting suicide.

title: La moglie del fattore
description: After his daughter weds, a middle-aged widower with a profitable farm decides to remarry, but finds choosing a suitable mate a problematic process.

title: Crepuscolo di gloria
description: A former Imperial Russian general and cousin of the Czar ends up in Hollywood as an extra in a movie directed by a former revolutionary.

title: L'uomo che ride
description: When a proud noble refuses to kiss the hand of the despotic King James in 1690, he is cruelly executed and his son surgically disfigured.

title: La passione di Giovanna d'Arco
description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

title: Fascino biondo
description: An awkward teenager hopelessly in love with her elder sister's boyfriend tries to make him notice her.

title: Tristana e la maschera
description: A prostitute seeking a fresh start becomes the obsession of a religious extremist.

title: Maschere di celluloide
description: A young lady from Georgia goes to Hollywood in the hopes of becoming an actress.

title: A rotta di collo
description: Harold "Speedy" Swift, a fan of

title: L'inafferrabile
description: The mastermind behind a ubiquitous spy operation learns of a dangerous romance between a Russian lady in his employ and a dashing agent from the government's secret service.

title: Io... e il ciclone
description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

title: L'angelo della strada
description: A woman on the run from the law finds her past catching up to her just as she is on the verge of true happiness.

title: Il vento
description: A frail young woman from the east moves in with her cousin in the west, where she causes tension within the family and is slowly driven mad.

title: Ricatto
description: After killing a man in self-defense, a young woman is blackmailed by a witness to the killing.

title: La canzone di Broadway
description: A pair of sisters from the vaudeville circuit try to make it big time on Broadway, but matters of the heart complicate the attempt.

title: The Cocoanuts
description: During the Florida land boom,

title: Una donna nella luna
description: A tenacious scientist blasts off for the moon in hopes of riches that may be found there.

title: L'isola del peccato
description: A fisherman and a rising young lawyer, who grew up as brothers, fall in love with the same girl.

title: Uomini di domenica
description: Two men and two women enjoy a pleasant Sunday at the beach amid the unending toil of the working week.

title: La regina Kelly
description: A convent girl is abducted and seduced by a prince before being sent off to a brothel in East Africa.

title: Il diario di una donna perduta
description: After falling pregnant to a pharmacist and refusing to marry, a young woman is thrown from her home and sent to a strict girls' reform school.

title: All'ovest niente di nuovo
description: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

title: Animal Crackers
description: Mayhem and zaniness ensue when a valuable painting goes missing during a party in honor of famed African explorer Captain Spaulding.

title: Anna Christie
description: A young woman reunites with her estranged father and falls in love with a sailor, but struggles to tell them about her dark past.

title: Il grande sentiero
description: Breck Coleman leads hundreds of settlers in covered wagons from the Mississippi River to their destiny out West.

title: L'angelo azzurro
description: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

title: Il nostro pane quotidiano
description: A Chicago waitress falls in love with a Minnesota farmer, and decides to face a life in the country.

title: La divorziata
description: When a woman discovers that her husband has been unfaithful to her, she decides to respond to his infidelities in kind.

title: Gli angeli dell'inferno
description: Brothers Monte and Ray leave Oxford to join the Royal Flying Corps. Ray loves Helen; Helen enjoys an affair with Monte; before they leave on their mission over Germany they find her in still another man's arms.

title: Piccolo Cesare
description: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

title: Marocco
description: A cabaret singer and a Legionnaire fall in love, but their relationship is complicated by the results of his womanizing and due to the appearance of a rich man who wants her for himself.

title: Omicidio!
description: A juror in a murder trial, after voting to convict, has second thoughts and begins to investigate on his own before the execution.

title: Le sang d'un poète
description: A young artist draws a face at a canvas on his easel. Suddenly the mouth on the drawing comes into life and starts talking. The artist tries to wipe it away with his hand, but when he looks...

title: La terra
description: In the peaceful countryside, Vassily opposes the rich kulaks over the coming of collective farming.

title: L'âge d'or
description: A surrealist tale of a man and a woman who are passionately in love with each other, but their attempts to consummate that passion are constantly thwarted by their families, the Church, and bourgeois society.

title: Il campione
description: An alcoholic ex-boxer struggles to provide a good living for his son.

title: La cagna
description: A woman and her pimp exploit a painter for money.

title: I pionieri del West
description: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

title: Luci della città
description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

title: Dracula
description: The ancient vampire Count Dracula arrives in England and begins to prey upon the virtuous young Mina.

title: Drácula
description: Centuries-old vampire Dracula preys upon the innocent Eva and her friends.

title: Frankenstein
description: An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.

title: Io amo
description: An alcoholic lawyer who successfully defended a notorious gambler on a murder charge objects when his free-spirited daughter becomes romantically involved with him.

title: The Front Page
description: An investigative reporter sees an opportunity for the story of a lifetime when an accused murderer escapes hanging.

title: L'allegro tenente
description: An amorous lieutenant is forced to marry a socially awkward princess, though he tries to keep his violin-playing girlfriend on the side.

title: M - Il mostro di Düsseldorf
description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Il falcone maltese
description: A lovely dame with dangerous lies employs the services of a private detective, who is quickly caught up in the mystery and intrigue of a statuette known as the Maltese Falcon.

title: Il milione
description: An impoverished painter and his rival engage in a race across Paris to recover a jacket concealing a winning lottery ticket.

title: Monkey Business - Quattro folli in alto mare
description: On a transatlantic crossing,

title: Ragazze in uniforme
description: At an all-girls boarding school, Manuela falls in love with a teacher, to terrific consequences.

title: L'angelo bianco
description: A nurse enlists the help of a petty criminal to foil a sinister plot to murder two children.

title: Muraglie
description: Two guys end up in prison after attempting to sell beer to a policeman during Prohibition.

title: La donna di platino
description: A young woman from a very rich family impulsively marries a reporter, but each assumes the other is the one whose lifestyle must change.

title: Nemico pubblico
description: A young hoodlum rises up through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.

title: Fiamma d'amore
description: An old traditional family and a modern family battle over land in a small English village and almost destroy each other.

title: Tabù
description: On the South Pacific island of Bora Bora, a young couple's love is threatened when the tribal chief declares the girl a sacred virgin.

title: La donna che non si deve amare
description: A prostitute's self-loathing makes her reluctant to marry an idealistic soldier during World War I.

title: A me la libertà
description: Seeking better life, two convicts escape from prison.

title: Venere bionda
description: A cabaret singer takes up with a millionaire to pay for her gravely ill husband's operation.

title: Boudu salvato dalle acque
description: A bookseller saves a tramp from drowning and shelters him, but the tramp's odd behavior starts to wear everyone down.

title: Il dottor X
description: A wisecracking New York reporter intrudes on a research scientist's quest to unmask The Moon Killer.

title: Il dottor Jekyll
description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

title: Estasi
description: Eva has just gotten married to an older gentleman. She leaves him and one day, she meets a young man and they fall in love. Fate brings the husband together with the young lover that has taken Eva from him.

title: Addio alle armi
description: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

title: Freaks
description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

title: Grand Hotel
description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

title: I fratelli Marx al college
description: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against the rival Darwin University.

title: Io sono un evaso
description: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.

title: Amami stanotte
description: A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.

title: The Mask of Fu Manchu
description: Englishmen race to find the tomb of Genghis Khan before the sinister Fu Manchu does.

title: Mata Hari
description: A semi-fictionalized account of the life of Mata Hari, an exotic dancer who was accused of spying for Germany during World War I.

title: La pericolosa partita
description: An insane hunter arranges for a ship to be wrecked on an island where he can indulge in some sort of hunting and killing of the passengers.

title: La mummia
description: A resurrected Egyptian mummy stalks a beautiful woman he believes to be the reincarnation of his lover and bride.

title: Il dottor Miracolo
description: A mad scientist seeks to mingle human blood with that of an ape, and resorts to kidnapping women for his experiments.

title: Numero diciassette
description: A gang of thieves gather at a safe house following a robbery, but a detective is on their trail.

title: The Old Dark House
description: Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when they stumble upon the Femm family estate.

title: Un'ora d'amore
description: An unhappily married couple try to come between a happy one.

title: Amanti senza domani
description: A terminally ill woman and a debonair murderer facing execution meet and fall in love on a trans-Pacific crossing, each without knowing the other's secret.

title: Pioggia
description: A prostitute newly arrived in the South Pacific finds herself at odds with a stern missionary determined to save her soul.

title: Lo schiaffo
description: The owner of a rubber plantation becomes involved with the new wife of one of his employees.

title: Red-Headed Woman
description: Lillian relentlessly attempts to seduce a married man.

title: Ricco e bizzarro
description: Believing that an unexpected inheritance will bring them happiness, a married couple instead finds their relationship strained to the breaking point.

title: Scarface - Lo sfregiato
description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

title: Tarzan, l'uomo scimmia
description: A trader and his daughter set off in search of the fabled graveyard of the elephants in deepest Africa, only to encounter a wild man raised by apes.

title: Il testamento del dottor Mabuse
description: A criminal mastermind uses hypnosis to rule the rackets after death.

title: Three on a Match
description: Although Vivian Revere is seemingly the most successful of a trio of reunited schoolmates, she throws it away by descending into a life of debauchery and drugs.

title: Mancia competente
description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

title: Sono nato, ma...
description: Two young brothers throw a tantrum when they discover that their father isn't the most important man in his workplace.

title: Vampyr
description: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

title: A che prezzo Hollywood?
description: The career of a waitress takes off when she meets an amiable drunken Hollywood director.

title: L'isola degli zombies
description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

title: 20.000 anni a Sing Sing
description: Brash hoodlum Tom Connors enters Sing Sing cocksure of himself and disrespectful toward authority, but his tough but compassionate warden changes him.

title: Baby Face
description: A young woman, sexually exploited all her life, decides to turn the tables and exploit the hapless men at a big city bank - by gleefully sleeping her way to the top.

title: L'amaro tè del generale Yen
description: A Chinese warlord and an engaged Christian missionary fall in love.

title: Argento vivo
description: Sexpot film star Lola Burns seeks a new image and tries marrying a marquis and adopting a baby - all sorts of schemes which go awry.

title: Cavalcata
description: A portrayal of the triumphs and tragedies of two English families, the upper-crust Marryots and the working-class Bridgeses, from 1899 to 1933.

title: Partita a quattro
description: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

title: La guerra lampo dei Fratelli Marx
description: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

title: Carioca
description: An aviator and band leader who is always getting his group fired for his flirtatious behavior with the female guests soon finds himself falling for an engaged woman.

title: Viva le donne
description: Chester Kent struggles against time, romance, and a rival's spy to produce spectacular live "prologues" for movie houses.

title: 42a strada
description: A director puts on what may be his last Broadway show and, at the last moment, a naive newcomer has to replace the star.

title: The Ghoul
description: An Egyptologist returns from the dead to take revenge on those who have violated his tomb.

title: Non sono un angelo
description: Circus performer Tira seeks a better life pursuing the company of wealthy New York men with improbable comic complications along the way.

title: L'uomo invisibile
description: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

title: L'isola delle anime perdute
description: An obsessed scientist conducts profane experiments in evolution, eventually establishing himself as the self-styled demigod to a race of mutated, half-human abominations.

title: Il pugnale cinese
description: Philo Vance, accompanied by his prize-losing Scottish terrier, investigates the locked-room murder of a prominent and much-hated collector whose broken Chinese vase provides an important clue.

title: King Kong
director: Merian C. Cooper, Ernest B. Schoedsack
description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female blonde star. He is then captured and brought back to New York City for public exhibition.

title: Signora per un giorno
description: A gangster tries to make Apple Annie, the Times Square apple seller, a lady for a day.

title: Piccole donne
description: A chronicle of the lives of a group of sisters growing up in nineteenth-century America.

title: La gloria del mattino
description: When a naively innocent, aspiring actress arrives on the Broadway scene, she is taken under the wing of several theater veterans who mentor her to ultimate success.

title: La maschera di cera
description: The disappearance of people and corpses leads a reporter to a wax museum and a sinister sculptor.

title: Le sei mogli di Enrico VIII
description: King Henry VIII marries five more times after his divorce from his first wife Catherine of Aragon.

title: Lady Lou - La donna fatale
description: In the Gay Nineties, a seductive nightclub singer contends with several suitors, including a jealous escaped convict and a handsome temperance league member.

title: The Son of Kong
description: The men who captured the giant ape King Kong return to Skull Island and find his likewise gigantic but far more friendly son.

title: I figli del deserto
description: When Stan and Ollie trick their wives into thinking that they are taking a medicinal cruise while they're actually going to a convention, the wives find out the truth the hard way.

title: Il vampiro
description: When corpses drained of blood begin to show up in a European village, vampirism is suspected to be responsible.

title: L'Atalante
description: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.

title: Nel paese delle meraviglie
description: Opposing the evil Barnaby, Ollie Dee and Stanley Dum try and fail to pay-off Mother Peep's mortgage and mislead his attempts to marry Little Bo. Enraged, Barnaby's Bogeymen are set on Toyland.

title: The Black Cat
description: American honeymooners in Hungary become trapped in the home of a Satan-worshiping priest when the bride is taken there for medical help following a road accident.

title: Cleopatra
description: The man-hungry Queen of Egypt leads Julius Caesar and Mark Antony astray, amid scenes of DeMillean splendor.

title: Il conte di Montecristo
description: After greedy men have Edmound Dantes unjustly imprisoned for 20 years for innocently delivering a letter entrusted to him, he escapes to get his revenge on them.

title: Cerco il mio amore
description: An American woman travels to England to seek a divorce from her absentee husband, where she meets - and falls for - a dashing performer.

title: Lo specchio della vita
description: A struggling widow and her daughter take in a black housekeeper and her fair-skinned daughter; the two women start a successful business, but face familial, identity, and racial issues along the way.

title: Accadde una notte
description: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

title: Che bel regalo
description: A henpecked New Jersey grocer makes plans to move to California to grow oranges, despite the resistance of his overbearing wife.

title: La pattuglia sperduta
description: A dozen British soldiers, lost in a Mesopotamian desert during World War I, are menaced by unseen Arab enemies.

title: L'uomo che sapeva troppo
description: A man and his wife receive a clue to an imminent assassination attempt, only to learn that their daughter has been kidnapped to keep them quiet.

title: Le due strade
description: The friendship between two orphans endures even though they grow up on opposite sides of the law and fall in love with the same woman.

title: Maniac
description: A former vaudevillian gifted at impersonation assists a mad scientist in reanimating corpses and soon goes mad himself.

title: La vedova allegra
description: When a small kingdom's main tax payer leaves for Paris, its king dispatches a dashing count to win back her allegiance.

title: Schiavo d'amore
description: A young man finds himself attracted to a cold and unfeeling waitress who may ultimately destroy them both.

title: L'imperatrice Caterina
description: A German noblewoman enters into a loveless marriage with the dim-witted, unstable heir to the Russian throne, then plots to oust him from power.

title: La primula rossa
description: A noblewoman discovers her husband is The Scarlet Pimpernel, a vigilante who rescues aristocrats from the blade of the guillotine.

title: Tarzan e la compagna
description: The idyllic life of Tarzan and Jane is challenged by men on safari who come seeking ivory, and come seeking Jane as well.

title: L'uomo ombra
description: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

title: L'isola del tesoro
description: Young Jim Hawkins is torn between his loyalty to his benefactors and his affection for lovable rogue Long John Silver in their struggle to recover a buried pirate treasure.

title: Ventesimo secolo
description: A flamboyant Broadway impresario who has fallen on hard times tries to get his former lover, now a Hollywood diva, to return and resurrect his failing career.

title: Storia di erbe fluttuanti
description: A kabuki actor's mistress hatches a jealous plot to bring down her lover's son.

title: Il club dei 39
description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

title: Primo amore
description: A poor socialite struggles in her newfound courtship due to the limitations imposed by her working-class family and unstable father.

title: Anna Karenina
description: The married Anna Karenina falls in love with Count Vronsky despite her husband's refusal to grant a divorce, and both must contend with the social repercussions.

title: La moglie di Frankenstein
description: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

title: Capitan Blood
description: After being wrongly convicted as a traitor, Peter Blood, an English physician, is sent to exile in the British colonies of the Caribbean, where he becomes a pirate.

title: Sui mari della Cina
description: When earthy Dolly Portland is rejected by Captain Gaskell in favor of a socialite, she aids Jamesy McCardle, in league with Malay pirates, in his plot to seize his ship.

title: Paura d'amare
description: An alcoholic actress who is considered a dangerous jinx is rehabilitated, but she then shows that she's as dangerous as ever.

title: Davide Copperfield
description: A gentle orphan discovers life and love in an indifferent adult world.

title: Capriccio spagnolo
description: A young man is warned by a captain about a temptress; nonetheless, he finds himself falling in love with her.

title: La pattuglia dei senza paura
description: It's the early days of the F.B.I. - federal agents working for the Department of Justice. Though they've got limited powers - they don't carry weapons and have to get local police approval ...

title: Donne di lusso 1935
description: Romantic antics abound among the guests at a luxury hotel, including a stage director, an eccentric millionaire, and the daughter of a financial backer.

title: Il traditore
description: In 1922, an Irish rebel informs on his friend, then feels doom closing in.

title: I lancieri del Bengala
description: Three British soldiers on the Northwest Frontier of India struggle against the enemy - and themselves.

title: Amore folle
description: Paris, France: a demented surgeon's obsession with a British actress leads him to secretly replace her concert pianist husband's train-wreck-mangled hands with those of a guillotined murderer. . . with a gift for knife-throwing.

title: I vampiri di Praga
description: When a nobleman is murdered, a professor of the occult blames vampires; but not all is what it seems.

title: Il sogno di una notte di mezza estate
description: Theseus, Duke of Athens, is going to marry Hyppolyta, Queen of the Amazons. Demetrius is engaged with Hermia, but Hermia loves Lysander. Helena loves Demetrius. Oberon and Titania, of the ...

title: Il sergente di ferro
description: In early 19th Century France an ex-convict who failed to report to parole is relentlessly pursued over a 20 year period by an obsessive policeman.

title: La tragedia del Bounty
description: A tyrannical ship captain takes his reluctant crew on a two-year voyage that will change British maritime law forever.

title: Una notte all'opera
description: A sly business manager and two wacky friends of two opera singers help them achieve success while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

title: The Raven
description: A brilliant surgeon obsessed with

title: Roberta
description: In Paris, a man clueless about fashion suddenly inherits his aunt's dress shop, while his bandleader friend reunites with his old flame.

title: Il maggiordomo
description: An English valet brought to the American west assimilates into the American way of life.

title: Il diavolo è femmina
description: When her father decides to flee to England, young Sylvia Scarlett must become Sylvester Scarlett and protect her father every step of the way, with the questionable help of plenty others.

title: Le due città
description: A pair of lookalikes, one a former French aristocrat and the other an alcoholic English lawyer, fall in love with the same woman amongst the turmoil of the French Revolution.

title: Cappello a cilindro
description: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

title: Il segreto del Tibet
description: The juice of a rare Tibetan flower is the only thing that keeps Dr. Glendon from turning into a werewolf during a full moon.

title: Tutta la città ne parla
description: A meek milquetoast of a clerk's mistaken for public enemy N° 1, and the notorious killer takes advantage of the situation

title: Dopo l'uomo ombra
description: Nick investigates the case of a missing man and later a murder that is connected to Nora's family.

title: Verso la vita
description: A charismatic thief makes friends with a bankrupt baron who comes to live in the thief's slum. Meanwhile the thief seeks the love of a young woman, who is held emotionally captive by her slumlord family.

title: Legione nera
description: When a hard-working machinist loses a promotion to a Polish-born worker, he is seduced into joining the secretive Black Legion, which intimidates foreigners through violence.

title: Le belve della città
description: After police captain, McLaren becomes commissioner, former detective Johnny Blake knocks him down convincing rackets boss Al Kruger that Blake's sincere in his effort to join the mob. "...

title: La carica dei seicento
description: A major countermands orders and attacks to avenge a previous massacre of men, women, and children.

title: Il delitto del signor Lange
description: The boss of a publishing company is a womanizer and a jerk, but what would happen if he suddenly disappeared?

title: Desiderio
description: An automotive engineer bound for a holiday in Spain meets a sultry jewel thief.

title: La bambola del diavolo
description: An escaped convict uses miniaturized humans to wreak vengeance on those that framed him.

title: Infedeltà
description: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.

title: La figlia di Dracula
description: Hungarian countess Marya Zaleska seeks the aid of a noted psychiatrist, hoping to free herself of a mysterious evil influence.

title: Flash Gordon
description: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Alexis Zarkov visit the planet Mongo to thwart the evil schemes of Emperor Ming the Merciless, who has set his planet on a collision course with Earth.

title: Seguendo la flotta
description: A Navy sailor tries to rekindle a romance with the woman he loves while on liberty in San Francisco.

title: Furia
description: When a wrongly accused prisoner barely survives a lynch mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

title: Le sorelle del Gion
description: Two geisha sisters lead a hard life in the Gion district of Kyoto. After one of them feels obliged to support a bankrupt businessman, the other sister sets up various schemes to get rid of him.

title: Figlio unico
description: A widow sends her only son away to receive a better education. Years later, she visits him, finding him a poor school teacher with a wife and son.

title: Il raggio invisibile
description: A scientist becomes murderous after discovering, and being exposed to the radiation of, a powerful new element called Radium X.

title: La donna del giorno
description: When a socialite sues a big paper for libel, the editor responsible calls in the help of his ignored fiancée and a former employee to frame her and make the false story seem true.

title: Maria di Scozia
description: The recently widowed Mary Stuart returns to Scotland to reclaim her throne but is opposed by her half-brother and her own Scottish lords.

title: Tempi moderni
description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: È arrivata la felicità
description: A simple small-town man inherits a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

title: L'impareggiabile Godfrey
description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

title: Allegri gemelli
description: Two pairs of long-lost twin brothers experience high jinks involving a valuable ring, cases of mistaken identity, and gangsters.

title: La foresta pietrificata
description: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

title: Sabotaggio
description: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.

title: San Francisco
description: A Barbary Coast saloonkeeper and a Nob Hill impresario are rivals for the affections of a beautiful singer, both personally and professionally in 1906 San Francisco.

title: Amore e mistero
description: After three British Agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.

title: La canzone di Magnolia
description: Despite her mother's objections, the naive young daughter of a show boat captain is thrust into the limelight as the company's new leading lady.

title: La vita del dottor Pasteur
description: The biography of the pioneering French microbiologist who helped revolutionize agriculture and medicine.

title: Follie d'inverno
description: A performer and gambler travels to New York City to raise the $25,000 he needs to marry his fiancée, only to become entangled with a beautiful aspiring dancer.

title: La fuga di Tarzan
description: An expedition seeking to bring Jane back to civilization, and Tarzan into captivity, gets more than it's bargained for.

title: Tell Your Children
description: Cautionary tale features a fictionalized take on the use of marijuana. A trio of drug dealers lead innocent teenagers to become addicted to "reefer" cigarettes by holding wild parties with jazz music.

title: La calunnia
description: Two school teachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie.

title: La vita futura
description: The story of a century: a decades-long second World War leaves plague and anarchy, then a rational state rebuilds civilization and attempts space travel.

title: L'ombra che cammina
description: After hapless pianist and ex-con John Elman is framed for murder, he is resurrected by a scientist after his execution.

title: Gelosia
description: The wife of a publishing executive mistakenly believes that her husband's relationship with his attractive secretary is more than professional.

title: Angelo
description: A woman and her husband take separate vacations, and she falls in love with another man.

title: L'orribile verità
description: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

title: Capitani coraggiosi
description: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship gets picked up by a fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep by joining the crew in their work.

title: Un giorno alle corse
description: A veterinarian posing as a doctor and a race-horse owner and his friends struggle to help keep a sanitarium open with the help of a misfit race-horse.

title: Strada sbarrata
description: The lives of a young man and woman, an infamous gangster and a group of street kids converge one day in a volatile New York City slum.

title: Un colpo di fortuna
description: A wealthy banker throws his wife's expensive fur coat off the roof of a building; it lands on the head of a stenographer, leading to everyone assuming she is his mistress and has access to his millions.

title: La buona terra
description: Although married Chinese farmers Wang and O-Lan initially experience success, their lives are complicated by declining fortunes and lean times, as well as the arrival of the beautiful young Lotus.

title: La grande illusione
description: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

title: Zoccoletti olandesi
description: A plucky little orphan girl gets dumped abruptly into her gruff, hermit grandfather's care, then later gets retaken and delivered as a companion for an injured girl.

title: Uragano
description: A Polynesian sailor -- unjustly imprisoned after defending himself against a colonial bully -- is relentlessly persecuted by his island's martinet French governor.

title: L'uomo di bronzo
description: Fight promoter Nick Donati grooms a bellhop as a future champ, but has second thoughts when the 'kid' falls for his sister.

title: Emilio Zola
description: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfuss Affair.

title: Orizzonte perduto
description: A plane crash delivers a group of people to the secluded land of Shangri-La, but is it really the miraculous utopia it appears to be?

title: Le cinque schiave
description: A crusading district attorney persuades a clip joint hostess to testify against her mobster boss after her innocent sister is accidentally murdered during one of his unsavory parties.

title: Le mie due mogli
description: Missing for seven years and presumed dead, a woman returns home on the day of her husband's second marriage.

title: Notturno tragico
description: When a rich but cantankerous dowager on an isolated estates hires an engaging handyman, her niece/companion becomes suspicious of his motives.

title: Nulla sul serio
description: An eccentric woman learns she is not dying of radium poisoning as earlier assumed, but when she meets a reporter looking for a story, she feigns sickness again for her own profit.

title: Il principe e il povero
description: A poor boy named Tom Canty and the Prince of Wales exchange identities but events force the pair to experience each other's lives as well.

title: Il prigioniero di Zenda
description: An Englishman on a Ruritarian holiday must impersonate the king when the rightful monarch, a distant cousin, is drugged and kidnapped.

title: Il bandito della Casbah
description: A wanted gangster is both king and prisoner of the Casbah. He is protected from arrest by his friends, but is torn by his desire for freedom outside. A visiting Parisian beauty may just tempt his fate.

title: Voglio danzare con te
description: A budding romance between a ballet master and a tap dancer becomes complicated when rumors surface that they're already married.

title: Biancaneve e i sette nani
description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

title: È nata una stella
description: A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, and achieves them only with the help of an alcoholic leading man whose best days are behind him.

title: Amore sublime
description: A working-class woman is willing to do whatever it takes to give her daughter a socially promising future.

title: La via dell'impossibile
description: A fun-loving couple, finding that they died and are now ghosts, decide to shake up the stuffy lifestyle of a friend of theirs.

title: Sono innocente
description: The public defender's secretary and an ex-convict get married and try to make a life together, but a series of disasters sends their lives spiraling out of control.

title: Giovane e innocente
description: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.

title: La leggenda di Robin Hood
description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.

title: Alessandro Nevsky
description: The story of how a great Russian prince led a ragtag army to battle an invading force of Teutonic Knights.

title: Un'americana nella casbah
description: Beautiful Gaby meets a romantic jewel thief in the mysterious Casbah.

title: Il sapore del delitto
description: A brilliant Park Avenue doctor becomes a criminal in order to do research into the criminal mind.

title: Gli angeli con la faccia sporca
description: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: Venti anni dopo
description: Stan, who has remained faithfully at his World War I post for twenty years, finally comes home where his best friend, Ollie, takes him in, thus allowing him to discover the many conveniences of the modern world.

title: L'ottava moglie di Barbablu
description: After learning her multi-millionaire fiancé has already been married seven times, the daughter of a penniless marquis decides to tame him.

title: La città dei ragazzi
description: When a death row prisoner tells him he wouldn't have led a life of crime if only he had had one friend as a child, Father Edward Flanagan decides to start a home for young boys.

title: Susanna!
description: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

title: L'angelo del male
description: In this classic adaptation of Emile Zola's novel, a tortured train engineer falls in love with a troubled married woman who has helped her husband commit a murder.

title: Girandola
description: A psychiatrist agrees to hypnotize his friend's girlfriend in order to convince her to accept his proposals of marriage, but she ends up falling for the psychiatrist instead.

title: A Christmas Carol
description: On Christmas Eve, Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by the spirit of his former partner, Jacob Marley. The deceased partner was as mean and miserly as Scrooge is now and he warns him to change his ways or face the consequences in the afterlife.

title: The Dawn Patrol
description: British flying aces in World War I contend with the harsh realities of war.

title: Incantesimo
description: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.

title: Albergo Nord
description: On the meandering Canal St. Martin, at the Parisian Hôtel du Nord, a nearly fatal gunshot separates a dejected young couple. But, amid a sad but beautiful panorama of lively characters, love has the final say. Can life be a fairy tale?

title: Figlia del vento
description: In 1850s Louisiana, a free-spirited Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, and vows to win him back.

title: La signora scompare
description: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

title: Maria Antonietta
description: The tragic life of Marie Antoinette, who became queen of France in her late teens.

title: Pigmalione
description: A phonetics and diction expert makes a bet that he can teach a cockney flower girl to speak proper English and pass as a lady in high society.

title: Il porto delle nebbie
description: A military deserter finds love and trouble (and a small dog) in a smoky French port city.

title: Servizio in camera
description: A penniless theatrical producer must outwit the hotel efficiency expert trying to evict him from his room, while securing a backer for his new play.

title: Una donna vivace
description: A professor marries a nightclub singer, much to the consternation of his family and friends back home.

title: L'eterna illusione
description: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

title: Le avventure di Sherlock Holmes
description: The master sleuth hunts his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning the crime of the century.

title: Si riparla dell'uomo ombra
description: An explosives manufacturer suspects a young man is out to kill him. He calls in new parents Nick and Nora to sort things out.

title: Tre pazzi a zonzo
description: The Marx Brothers try to help the owner of a circus recover some stolen funds before he finds himself out of a job.

title: Ragazzi attori
description: A group of vaudevillians struggling to compete with talkies hits the road hoping for a comeback. Frustrated to be left behind, all of their kids put on a show themselves to raise money for the families and to prove they've got talent, too.

title: Situazione imbarazzante
description: An unemployed woman discovers an abandoned baby on the steps of an orphanage, and accepts an offer to take responsibility for the child in return for a job.

title: Beau Geste
description: Three adopted English brothers join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa, after one of them steals their adoptive family's famous heirloom sapphire.

title: Il fantasma di mezzanotte
description: When an eccentric family meets in their uncle's remote, decaying mansion on the tenth anniversary of his death for the reading of his will, murder and madness follow.

title: Tramonto
description: A young socialite is diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor, and must decide whether or not she'll meet her final days with dignity.

title: Partita d'azzardo
description: When a tough western town needs taming, the mild-mannered son of a hard-nosed sheriff gets the job.

title: Gli avventurieri
description: A Texas cattle agent witnesses first hand, the brutal lawlessness of Dodge City and takes the job of sheriff to clean the town up.

title: La più grande avventura
description: Newlyweds Gil and Lana Martin try to establish a farm in the Mohawk Valley but are menaced by Indians and Tories as the Revolutionary War begins.

title: Morire all'alba
description: A corrupt D.A. with political ambitions is angered by news stories implicating him in criminal activity and decides to frame the reporter who wrote them for manslaughter in order to silence him.

title: I diavoli volanti
description: Ollie has fallen in love with the innkeeper's daughter in Paris. The only problem - she's very much in love with her husband. To forget her he joins the Foreign Legion with Stan. Bad idea.

title: Le quattro piume
description: A timid British Army officer has quit and burns his last day summons to a war in Egypt. Calling him a coward, his girl friend and 3 officer friends give him a white feather. In redemption, he shadows his friends in war to save their lives.

title: Gaslight
description: Twenty years after the murder of Alice Barlow, her house is finally occupied again. However, the husband from the couple who have moved in has a secret which he will do anything to keep hidden.

title: Via col vento
description: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: Addio, mr. Chips!
description: An aged teacher and former headmaster of a boarding school recalls his career and his personal life over the decades.

title: I viaggi di Gulliver
description: A doctor washes ashore on an island inhabited by little people.

title: Gunga Din
description: In 19th century India, three British soldiers and a native waterbearer must stop a secret mass revival of the murderous Thuggee cult before it can rampage across the land.

title: Il mastino dei Baskerville
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound, a beast that may be stalking a young heir on the fog-shrouded moorland that makes up his estate.

title: Notre Dame
description: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

title: Non puoi impedirmi d'amare
description: After a wealthy man finds out his wife is a gold digger, he meets and falls for a widowed mother, and complications ensue.

title: Intermezzo
description: A violinist's piano accompanist retires. He hears his daughter's piano teacher/

title: Questo mondo è meraviglioso
description: When a tycoon is accused of murder, the private eye tracking him finds himself roped in as an accessory and attempts to evade police, kidnapping a poetess along the way.

title: La taverna della Giamaica
description: In Cornwall, 1819, a young woman discovers she's living near a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecks for profit.

title: Jess il bandito
description: After railroad agents forcibly evict the James family from their family farm, Jesse and Frank turn to banditry for revenge.

title: Alba tragica
description: After committing a murder, a man locks himself in his apartment and recollects the events that led him to the killing.

title: La piccola principessa
description: A little girl is left by her father in an exclusive seminary for girls, due to her father having to go to South Africa to fight in the Second Boer War.

title: Un grande amore
description: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship. They arrange to reunite six months later, after he has had a chance to earn a decent living.

title: Ritorna l'amore
description: While on a business trip, an ambitious young lawyer meets and immediately falls in love with a stranger. They wed the following day, and tragedy soon strikes.

title: La signora di mezzanotte
description: A chorus girl stranded in Paris is set up by a millionaire to break up his wife's affair with another man, while being romantically pursued by a cab driver.

title: Mr. Smith va a Washington
description: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

title: Ninotchka
description: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

title: Uomini e topi
description: Two itinerant migrant workers, one mentally disabled and the other his carer, take jobs as ranch hands during the Great Depression to fulfill their shared dream of owning their own ranch.

title: Il grande amore
description: The arrival of an ex-lover on a young woman's wedding day sets in motion a chain of events which will alter her and her cousin's lives forever.

title: Avventurieri dell'aria
description: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win an important contract.

title: Il conte di Essex
description: A depiction of the love/hate relationship between Queen Elizabeth I and Robert Devereux, the Earl of Essex.

title: I ruggenti anni venti
description: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

title: La regola del gioco
description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

title: Il figlio di Frankenstein
description: One of the sons of Frankenstein finds his father's monster in a coma and revives him, only to find out he is controlled by Ygor who is bent on revenge.

title: Ombre rosse
description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

title: La vita di Vernon e Irene Castle
description: The story of married couple

title: Il figlio di Tarzan
description: Tarzan finds a boy from a crashed plane and raises him with Jane in the jungle. A search party comes looking for the plane.

title: La via dei giganti
description: In 1862, Central Pacific and Union Pacific Railroads compete westward across the wilderness toward California.

title: Il mago di Oz
description: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.

title: Donne
description: A study of the lives and romantic entanglements of various interconnected women.

title: Cime tempestose
description: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.

title: La storia dell'ultimo crisantemo
description: The adopted son of a legendary actor, and an aspiring star himself, turns to his infant brother's wet nurse for support and affection - only for her to give up everything for her beloved's glory.

title: Paradiso proibito
description: A duchess' irrational behavior toward the governess of her children triggers tragic events that will change her family's lives forever.

title: Un comodo posto in banca
description: Henpecked Egbert Sousé has comic adventures as a substitute film director and unlikely bank guard.

title: La febbre del petrolio
description: Two buddies who rise from fly-by-night wildcatters to oil tycoons over a twenty year period both love the same woman.

title: Balla con me
description: Johnny Brett and King Shaw are an unsuccessful dance team in New York. A producer discovers Brett as the new partner for Clare Bennett, but Brett, who thinks he is one of the people they lent money to gives him the name of his partner.

title: Il vendicatore
description: When retired racket boss John Sarto tries to reclaim his place and former friends try to kill him, he finds solace in a monastery and reinvents himself as a pious monk.

title: Un colpo di fortuna
description: When the co-workers of an ambitious clerk trick him into thinking he has won $25,000 in a slogan contest, he begins to use the money to fulfill his dreams. What will happen when the ruse is discovered?

title: Noi siamo le colonne
description: As a reward for capturing a bank robber, Stan and Ollie get scholarship to Oxford, but are met with resentment by other students.

title: La città del peccato
description: Danny is a content truck driver, but his girl Peggy shows potential as a dancer and hopes he too can show ambition. Danny acquiesces and pursues boxing to please her, but the two begin to spend more time working than time together.

title: La belva umana
description: In Kansas, during the Civil War opposing pro-Union and pro-Confederate camps clash and visiting Texan Bob Seton runs afoul of William Cantrell's Raiders.

title: Notti di terrore
description: A mad scientist develops an aftershave lotion that causes his gigantic bats to kill anyone who wears it.

title: Il dottor Cyclops
description: A mad scientist working in the South American jungle miniaturizes his colleagues when he feels his megalomania is threatened.

title: Fantasia
description: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

title: Il prigioniero di Amsterdam
description: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

title: La donna e lo spettro
description: A radio broadcaster, his quaking manservant and an heiress investigate the mystery of a haunted castle in Cuba.

title: I cowboys del deserto
description: The Marx Brothers come to the rescue in the Wild West when a young man, trying to settle an old family feud so he can marry the girl he loves, runs afoul of crooks.

title: Furore
description: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

title: Il grande dittatore
description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: Il grande McGinty
description: Dan McGinty has great success in his chosen field of crooked politics, but he endangers it all in one crazy moment of honesty.

title: La signora del venerdì
description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: Ti amo ancora
description: Boring businessman Larry Wilson recovers from amnesia and discovers he's really a con man...and loves his soon-to-be-ex wife.

title: Il ritorno dell'uomo invisibile
description: The owner of a coal mining operation, falsely imprisoned for fratricide, takes a drug to make him invisible, despite its side effect: gradual madness.

title: La donna invisibile
description: An attractive model with an ulterior motive volunteers as guinea pig for an invisibility machine.

title: Suss l'ebreo
description: Infamous anti-Semitic Nazi propaganda historical drama about Duke Karl Alexander of Württemberg and his treasurer Süß Oppenheimer.

title: Kitty Foyle, ragazza innamorata
description: A hard-working, white-collar girl from a middle-class family meets and falls in love with a young socialite, but she soon clashes with his family.

title: Ombre malesi
description: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

title: Lungo viaggio di ritorno
description: A merchant ship's crew tries to survive the loneliness of the sea and the coming of war.

title: Il segno di Zorro
description: A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop in order to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.

title: Bufera mortale
description: The Roth family leads a quiet life in a small village in the German Alps during the early 1930s. When the Nazis come to power, the family is divided and Martin Breitner, a family friend, is caught up in the turmoil.

title: The Mummy's Hand
description: An ancient mummy is revived to destroy the invaders of the 3,000 year-old tomb of an Egyptian princess.

title: My Little Chickadee
description: After a scandal runs a gold-digger out of town, she meets a con artist and becomes embroiled in a string of petty deceits.

title: Night Train to Munich
description: After Germany invades Czechoslovakia, the German and the British intelligence services try to capture Czech scientist Dr. Axel Bomasch (James Harcourt), inventor of a new type of armor-plating.

title: Passaggio a Nord-Ovest
description: Langdon Towne and Hunk Marriner join Major Rogers' Rangers as they wipe out an Indian village. They set out for Fort Wentworth, but when they arrive they find no soldiers and none of the supplies they expected.

title: La nostra città
description: Change comes slowly to a small New Hampshire town in the early 20th century.

title: Scandalo a Filadelfia
description: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

title: Pinocchio
description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

title: Rebecca - La prima moglie
description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: Ricorda quella notte
description: A shoplifter and her prosecutor fall in love, creating tensions for his career and family.

title: Il vendicatore di Jess il bandito
description: Frank James continues to avoid arrest in order to take revenge on the Ford brothers for their murder of his brother Jesse.

title: La danzatrice di Singapore
description: Two playboys try to forget previous romances in Singapore - until they meet a beautiful dancer.

title: I pascoli dell'odio
description: In 1854, Jeb Stuart, George Custer and other graduates from West Point are posted to Kansas to help pacify the territory before railroad construction to Santa Fe can resume.

title: C'era una volta un piccolo naviglio
description: Oliver suffers a nervous breakdown as a result of working in a horn factory, but when he follows doctor's orders about sea air, he finds an ex-con is aboard.

title: Lo sparviero del mare
description: Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for the attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills on the sword.

title: Scrivimi fermo posta
description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

title: L'isola del diavolo
description: Convicts escaping from Devil's Island come under the influence of a strange Christ-like figure.

title: Lo sconosciuto del terzo piano
description: An aspiring reporter is the key witness at the murder trial of a young man accused of cutting a café owner's throat and is soon accused of a similar crime himself.

title: Strada maestra
description: When one of two truck-driving brothers loses an arm, they both join a transport company where later, the other is falsely charged as an accessory in the murder of the owner.

title: Il ladro di Bagdad
description: After being tricked and cast out of Bagdad by the evil Jaffar, King Ahmad joins forces with a thief named Abu to reclaim his throne, the city, and the Princess he loves.

title: Carovana d'eroi
description: Union officer Kerry Bradford escapes from Confederate Prison and is set to Virginia City in Nevada. Once there he finds that the former commander of his prison Vance Irby is planning to send $5 million in gold to save the Confederacy.

title: Il ponte di Waterloo
description: During World War I, believing her fiance to be dead, a young ballerina loses her job and is forced to turn to prostitution.

title: L'uomo del West
description: Judge Roy Bean, a self-appointed hanging judge in Vinegarroon, Texas, befriends saddle tramp Cole Harden, who opposes Bean's policy against homesteaders.

title: Colpo di fulmine
description: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mob boss lover.

title: Il Bazar delle follie
description: A detective is hired to protect the life of a singer, who has recently inherited a department store, from the store's crooked manager.

title: Sangue e arena
description: Illiterate peasant Juan Gallardo rises meteorically to fame and fortune in the bullfight arena only to sow the seeds of his own fall.

title: Sposa contro assegno
description: A financially-strapped charter pilot hires himself to an oil tycoon to kidnap his madcap daughter and prevent her from marrying a vapid band leader.

title: Gianni e Pinotto reclute
description: Two sidewalk salesman enlist in the army in order to avoid jail, only to find that their drill instructor is the police officer who tried having them imprisoned.

title: Quarto potere
description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

title: L'oro del demonio
description: A nineteenth-century New Hampshire farmer who makes a pact with Satan for economic success enlists Daniel Webster to extract him from his contract.

title: Il diavolo si converte
description: A tycoon goes undercover to ferret out agitators at a department store, but gets involved in their lives instead.

title: Il dottor Jekyll e Mr. Hyde
description: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

title: Dumbo
description: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

title: Gli invasori
description: A World War II U-boat crew are stranded in northern Canada. To avoid internment, they must make their way to the border and get into the still-neutral U.S.

title: La grande menzogna
description: After a newlywed's husband apparently dies in a plane crash, she discovers that her rival for his affections is now pregnant with his child.

title: Hellzapoppin'
description: Olsen and Johnson, a pair of stage comedians, try to turn their play into a movie and bring together a young couple in love, while breaking the fourth wall every step of the way.

title: L'inafferrabile signor Jordan
description: Boxer Joe Pendleton dies 50 years too soon due to a heavenly mistake, and is given a new life as a millionaire playboy.

title: Una pallottola per Roy
description: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.

title: L'inafferrabile spettro
description: After inheriting a fortune from a gangster, two dim-witted service station attendants find themselves stranded in a haunted house.

title: Com'era verde la mia valle
description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

title: Situazione pericolosa
description: Why is Inspector Ed Cornell trying to railroad Frankie Christopher for the murder of model Vicky Lynn?

title: Allegri naviganti
description: Russ Raymond, America's number one crooner, disappears and joins the Navy under the name Tommy Halstead. Dorothy Roberts, a magazine journalist, is intent on finding out what happened to ...

title: Sorvegliato speciale
description: The step-daughter of a district attorney falls in love with a gangster on parole who her father originally imprisoned.

title: Lady Eva
description: A trio of classy card sharks targets the socially awkward heir to brewery millions for his money, until one of them falls in love with him.

title: Piccole volpi
description: The ruthless, moneyed Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.

title: Innamorato pazzo
description: A series of misunderstandings on their fourth wedding anniversary lead an architect and his wife to break up, but he pretends to be insane and even poses as his own sister in order to win her back.

title: Il mistero del falco
description: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

title: Duello mortale
description: British hunter Thorndike vacationing in Bavaria has Hitler in his gun sight. He is captured, beaten, left for dead, and escapes back to London where he is hounded by German agents and aided by a young woman.

title: Il signore resta a pranzo
description: When acerbic critic Sheridan Whiteside slips on the front steps of a provincial Ohio businessman's home and breaks his hip, he and his entourage take over the house indefinitely.

title: Arriva John Doe!
description: A man needing money agrees to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a political movement begins.

title: Il signore e la signora Smith
description: A couple who have been married for three years are shocked to learn that their marriage is not legally valid.

title: Never Give a Sucker an Even Break
description: A filmmaker attempts to sell a surreal script he has written, which comes to life as he pitches it.

title: Ho sognato un angelo
description: A couple's big dreams give way to a life full of unexpected sadness and unexpected joy.

title: The Reluctant Dragon
description: Humorist Robert Benchley learns about the animation process at Walt Disney Studios while trying to find the great man himself to pitch him the idea of making a cartoon about a shy dragon.

title: Avventura a Zanzibar
description: Stranded in Africa, Chuck and his pal Fearless have comic versions of jungle adventures, featuring two attractive con-women.

title: Il lupo dei mari
description: After being fished out of the sea by a sealer, three fugitives find themselves prisoners of the ship's brutal skipper who refuses to put them ashore and they hatch an escape plan during a crew mutiny.

title: Il sergente York
description: A marksman is drafted in World War I and ends up becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

title: L'ombra dell'uomo ombra
description: Nick and Nora are at their wisecracking best as they investigate murder and racketeering at a local race track.

title: I misteri di Shanghai
description: In Shanghai, dragon-lady 'Mother' Gin Sling operates a gambling house for wealthy patrons but she clashes with influential land developer Sir Guy Charteris who wants to put her out-of-business.

title: Bionda fragola
description: Quick-tempered yet likable Biff Grimes falls for the beautiful Virginia Brush, but he is not the only young man in the neighborhood who is smitten with her.

title: I dimenticati
description: A Hollywood director, John L Sullivan, sets out to experience life as a poor, homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

title: Il sospetto
description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

title: Il tesoro segreto di Tarzan
description: Tarzan's jungle home, and his family, Jane and Boy, are threatened by men greedy for gold.

title: Il grande ammiraglio
description: The story of courtesan and dance-hall girl Emma Hamilton, including her relationships with Sir William Hamilton and Admiral Horatio Nelson and her rise and fall, set during the Napoleonic Wars.

title: Quell'incerto sentimento
description: A psychoanalyst causes a woman to doubt her happy marriage.

title: La storia del generale Custer
description: A highly fictionalized account of the life of George Armstrong Custer from his arrival at West Point in 1857 to his death at the battle of the Little Big Horn in 1876.

title: Bionda in paradiso
description: A fun-loving young woman is murdered after trading bedrooms with her wealthy friend. Her ghost seeks aid from Topper to find the murderer.

title: Fred il ribelle
description: When Edward Creighton leads the construction of the Western Union to unite East with West, he hires a Western reformed outlaw and a tenderfoot Eastern surveyor.

title: L'uomo lupo
description: A practical man is infected with a horrific disease his disciplined mind tells him cannot possibly exist.

title: Volto di donna
description: A female blackmailer with a disfiguring facial scar meets a plastic surgeon who offers her the possibility of looking like a normal woman.

title: L'inarrivabile felicità
description: In order to cover up his philandering ways, a married Broadway producer sets one of his dancers up on a date with a chorus girl for whom he had bought a gift, but the two dancers fall in love for real.

title: Le fanciulle delle follie
description: Discovery by Flo Ziegfeld changes a girl's life but not necessarily for the better, as three beautiful women find out when they join the spectacle on Broadway: Susan, the singer who must ...
